replies.body: {{champion:107}} Riot. Please make more skins for Rengar. He doesn't have enough room to express himself through the way he looks. Maybe White Tiger Rengar or Sabertooth Rengar. Or for a hunter of the night look maybe Panther Rengar.
BATTLE BUNNY RENGAR
I want a Kitty Cat Rengar.  His bola is a ball of yarn!
his w could be a "meow"
I'm all for this
RITO PLEASE GIVE THIS MAN A MEDAL AND MAKE THIS HAPPEN!      please?
COTTON TAIL WARWICK
Lucky for you, Night Hunter Rengar is due to be released soon-ish!{{champion:107}}
soon(TM)
Soon™
Rework coming "Soon" {{champion:83}}

But I want a funny skin for this monster!

Kitty Cat Rengar:

He is a cute kitten wearing a bow, and his left hand has big kitty claws.  His right hand is holding a little Fish (Savagery Blade).  He cutely meows (Battle Roar).  He throws little balls of yarn (Bola Strike).  And he pounces on his enemies (Unseen Predator).  His Recall could be him drinking a bowl of milk, and then he falls into it.

I think a lot of the serious and underrated champions should have funny skins so people buy them.
Why don't you fking pay attention to PBE or Leaguepedia news for once, hes got a skin coming within the next couple patches.
You could say it more nicely, y'know.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9IMHFfefrko :D {{champion:107}}
Wow that's hideous.
That disrespect in front of Nasus. Respect the cane bro

Just bought that soraka skin -.- Guess I didn't read the completed sale list very well!
Send Riot a support ticket, you'll be refunded half the price as long as you bought it within 2 weeks.
Unless if you have refund tokens, no they won't
You know that's not true right? Riot will give you half the RP back if you bought a champ/skin right before a sale.
I think the completed sale list was only for May.

UGH.  AstroNautilus is ~~out of this world~~ one of the coolest skins, but he just **so** doesn't fit the current meta. I wish utility junglers would make a li'l comeback so I could justify the purchase.
*whispers* Support Nautilus.{{champion:111}} "Love me again."

{{champion:48}} *Twas teh night b4 Trollday, not a troll in sight. They all popped out of nowhere, and caused so much fright. They trolled and trolled, all through the night. "Feed me" they said, "It will be alright"*

There is too time for stories!!

Regards, peers scientific society of Runeterra. I am Master Ryze and come share a great discovery that I carried in my observatory. Thanks to a recent improvement made ​​in my telescope, I could identify new constellations - and I think it's a great opportunity to Homenagearmos Champions of our world.

At the center of this star chart, we have a training that leads to a growing and blue moon. Any objection to this we name Soraka Celestina ? 487 RP

Right, what seemed to be a willingness to cross seems, in fact, a large anchor. AstroNautilus is my suggestion for this constellation. 675 RP

Galactic Renekton is the only name that comes to mind for this one. Not so common so see something that looks so much like a crocodile in heaven, right? 260 RP

This large lion's head could be a little inspired name, but the arms of stars that refer to braids leave rengar as favorite time. 487 RP

Intriguing: sets of star formation of shuriken. I'm sure Kennen love to be immortalized in this way. All agreed? 440 RP

wo crossed axes such as Olaf ? This seems too perfect to be coincidence. I need to study this more in depth here. 395 RP

Academics, I close my talk here. Upon agreement, I will create a motion to ensure that these are the heroes who scientists, children, couples in love and browsers remember to look at the big infinity above us. Cast your vote between April 29 and May 1 , and then summon another meeting these to align it. Thank you!
